properties.name: altTextDescription
properties.description: Gets or sets a string that represents the alternative text associated with the inline image

properties.name: altTextTitle
properties.description: Gets or sets a string that contains the title for the inline image.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Gets or sets a number that describes the height of the inline image.

properties.name: hyperlink
properties.description: Gets or sets the hyperlink associated with the inline image.

properties.name: lockAspectRatio
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the inline image retains its original proportions when you resize it.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Gets or sets a number that describes the width of the inline image.

properties.name: parentContentControl
properties.description: Gets the content control that contains the inline image. Returns null if there isn't a parent content control.

properties.name: paragraph
properties.description: Gets the paragraph that contains the inline image.

properties.name: imageFormat
properties.description: Gets the format of the inline image.

properties.name: parentTableCell
properties.description: Gets the table cell that contains the inline image. Returns null if it is not contained in a table cell.

properties.name: parentTable
properties.description: Gets the table that contains the inline image. Returns null if it is not contained in a table.

methods.name: getBase64ImageSrc
methods.description: Gets the base64 encoded string representation of the inline image.

methods.name: insertContentControl
methods.description: Wraps the inline picture with a rich text content control.

methods.name: insertInlinePictureFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts an inline picture at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: base64EncodedImage
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded image to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertBreak
methods.description: Inserts a break at the specified location in the main document. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: breakType
parameters.description: Required. The break type to add.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertText
methods.description: Inserts text at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertHtml
methods.description: Inserts HTML at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Required. The HTML to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertOoxml
methods.description: Inserts OOXML at the specified location.  The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: ooxml
parameters.description: Required. The OOXML to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertFileFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts a document at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: base64File
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded content of a .docx file.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertParagraph
methods.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: paragraphText
parameters.description: Required. The paragraph text to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the inline picture from the document.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the inline picture. This causes Word to scroll to the selection.

parameters.name: selectionMode
parameters.description: Optional. The selection mode can be 'Select', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Select' is the default.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the picture, or the starting or ending point of the picture, as a range.

parameters.name: rangeLocation
parameters.description: Optional. The range location can be 'Whole', 'Start' or 'End'.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
